english_example_sentence: The tired traveler rested by finally reaching the village after making a long journey.
russian_example_sentence: Уставший путешественник отдохнул, наконец добравшись до деревни после долгого путешествия.
turkish_example_sentence: Yorgun gezgin, uzun bir yolculuk yaparak nihayet köye ulaşarak dinlendi.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Yorgun gezgin, uzun bir yolculuk yaparak nihayet köye ______ dinlendi.
